org.magelan.core
Class PaintFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.magelan.core.PaintFactory

public class PaintFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory class for Paint instances. Whereas paints are not themselves serializable, but hatch entities need to be, the paint is stored as a string. When an entity is deserialized it will ask this class to produce the proper paint given its string id. Identifiers of predefined paints should NOT contain '.'. If an identifier contains the '.' symbol it is assumed to be path to an image file.

Version:
1.0, 01/2005
Author:
Assen Antov
